title: Grendel Tales: Devils and Deaths
description: Devils and Deaths: Grendel Drago has been fatally contaminated with radiation. But a Grendel must die in battle, not in bed, so Drago prepares for his final missionâ€”he will kill the mysterious monster on the outskirts of town and die in the blaze of combat.Devil's Choices: Picking up ten years later, this story finds the Agram clan embroiled in war. Only these days, it's become a lot harder to tell who's on what side! Since the death of his brother Drago, Goran has developed into the finest warrior in his clan. Unfortunately, he's also the most insubordinate, and his company gets banished to the front lines.
author: Darko Macan
